I'm with J.B. on this one. The client tells us what business problem they w=
ant solved, they tell us the definition of "solved" and then they decide wh=
ether our lovingly crafted software meets their definition of "solved" with=
in the timeframes and expenses that they are willing to allow us.

Notice t=
he pattern here? The client ALWAYS decides.

Simon
